resources.string: Send us a clear photo of your Social Security card or pay stub.
Send us a clear photo of your driver\'s license, passport, or government-issued ID card.
Send us a clear photo of your utility bill, cell phone bill, or bank statement.
We need the info below to confirm your identity. It helps us keep your account more secure. Once we\'ve got your docs, we\'ll review them and get back to you in 2–3 business days.
It looks like there was a problem on our end. Try again.
Your doc is uploading. We\'ll notify you once we\'ve finished reviewing it.
We\'ll begin reviewing it and update you as soon as we\'re done.
To take photos, let PayPal access the camera and storage.
To take photos, let PayPal access the camera.
To take photos, let PayPal access the storage.
Make sure your phone isn\'t in Airplane mode and is connected to WiFi or cellular data.
Looks like something went wrong. Try again.
It looks like you may have sent us the wrong info.
It looks like you may have sent us the wrong info.
We\'re having trouble reviewing the doc you sent. Can you send a clearer photo of it?
We sent you an email with details as to why we couldn\'t approve your doc.
Looks like something went wrong on our end. Try again in a minute or two.
It looks like you may have sent us the wrong info. Try again by sending us a clear photo of your utility bill, cell phone bill, or bank statement.
It looks like you may have sent us the wrong info. Try again by sending us a clear photo of your driver\'s license or government-issued ID card.
It looks like you may have sent us the wrong info. Try again by sending us a clear photo of your Social Security card or pay stub.
Log into your PayPal account on your computer to send us this info.
This is a new Smartling test string.
